ProductInfo.Features:
EDGE 2G Bands - 850/900/1800/1900; Supported 3G Modes: MHz HSPA 850/1900/2100 MHz
1.2GHz Snapdragon 400 Quad Core CPU, 8GB Internal Memory; Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Wi-Fi hotspot; Bluetooth v3.0 with A2DP, EDR
Unlocked to work on any GSM network anywhere in the world.  USA - AT&T;, T-mobile (2G only); Africa / Europe / Asia - all GSM carriers; Canada - Rogers / FIDO / Chatr / Bell / Koodo / Virgin / City;
Incompatible Networks: Canada: Wind / Mobilicity / Videoron   USA: Verizon / T-mobile 3G (check with carrier) / All CDMA carriers.
Black Color - Simcard: Micro-SIM, Android 4.3 (Jelly Bean / KitKat upgrade in Jan 2014),, 4.5" LCD, GSM, New Unlocked, Front Facing 1.3MP Camera, Rear 5MP Camera with Flash, Actual Photos attached
